Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Goten Hotel in Guangzhou (Baiyun), you'll be convenient to Guangzhou Baiyun International Convention Center and Baiyun Mountain. This hotel is within close proximity of Guangzhou New Stadium and Guangzhou Gymnasium.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 70 air-conditioned guestrooms. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access is available.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities such as complimentary babysitting/childcare, a television in the lobby, and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Grab a bite from a grocery/convenience store serving guests of Goten Hotel.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, express check-in, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. Planning an event in Guangzhou? This hotel has 47 square feet (4 square meters) of space consisting of a conference center and a meeting room. Free valet parking is available onsite.


Check-in time starts at noon Check-out time is noon
Grab a bite from a grocery/convenience store serving guests of Goten Hotel.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Make use of convenient amenities such as complimentary babysitting/childcare, a television in the lobby, and tour/ticket assistance.

With a stay at Goten Hotel in Guangzhou (Baiyun), you'll be convenient to Guangzhou Baiyun International Convention Center and Baiyun Mountain. This hotel is within close proximity of Guangzhou New Stadium and Guangzhou Gymnasium.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Guangzhou Baiyun International Convention Center - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
Baiyun Mountain - 2.5 km / 1.6 mi
Guangzhou New Stadium - 3.4 km / 2.1 mi
Guangzhou Gymnasium - 3.4 km / 2.1 mi
Big Hippo Water World - 3.6 km / 2.3 mi
Guangzhou Wanda Plaza - 4.8 km / 3 mi
Yuntai Garden - 5.8 km / 3.6 mi
Guangzhou Museum of Art - 7.2 km / 4.5 mi
Guangzhou TV Tower - 7.3 km / 4.5 mi
Guangzhou Zoo - 7.6 km / 4.7 mi
Huanghuagang Park - 7.7 km / 4.8 mi
Liuhua Exhibition Center - 7.8 km / 4.8 mi
Guangzhou Friendship Store - 7.8 km / 4.9 mi
Yuexiu Park - 7.9 km / 4.9 mi
Statue of Five Goats - 7.9 km / 4.9 mi

The preferred airport for Goten Hotel is Guangzhou (CAN-Baiyun Intl.) - 21.1 km / 13.1 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
